DOC.brief_summary: The primary outcome study compare effectiveness second complete course 200 mg mifepristone 800 mcg misoprostol ongoing pregnancy follow mifepristone-misoprostol medical abortion .
DOC.brief_title: Non-surgical Alternatives Treatment Failed Medical Abortion
DOC.detailed_description: This multi-site double-blind , randomize control trial ass treatment repeat mifepristone-misoprostol regimen two-dose misoprostol-alone regimen woman diagnose ongoing pregnancy â‰¤77 day gestational age 1-week follow-up medical abortion . The sample stratify two cohort : woman ongoing pregnancy < = 56 day gestation woman ongoing pregnancy 57-77 day gestation . Eligible woman agree participate study randomly assign either Group 1 treatment 200 mg mifepristone follow 24-48 hour 800 mcg buccal misoprostol , follow 4 misoprostol placebo pill 3-12 hour later , Group 2 treatment one mifepristone placebo pill , follow 800 mcg buccal misoprostol 24-48 hour later another 800 mcg dose repeat 3-12 hour . The study also assess acceptability additional medication ongoing pregnancy follow initial course mifepristone-misoprostol medical abortion .
DOC.criteria: Have ultrasound evidence ongoing pregnancy ( embryo cardiac activity ) < = 77 day gestational age followup use mifepristonemisoprostol regimen termination pregnancy Agree comply study procedure Able consent study participation Have ongoing pregnancy take initial course mifepristone misoprostol study site Are < 18 year old US Canadian sit Present medical abortion outcome include persistent nonviable pregnancy empty sac Are unable provide contact information followup purpose
